comments:
Description: Cannot find function error is displayed while the function is prompte d in script.

build version: 2.30 v20071115-800

steps to reproduce:
1. New a report and new a chart in it.
2. In the Properties Editor->Named Expressions, add a Named Expression,eg. Expression Name: Max, Default Value: "max";
3. Select the chart and switch to Script page, input some script to call the getNamedExpressionValue, like: var Max=this.getNamedExpressionValue(max);
4. Preview.

Expected result: No error should pop up.

Actual result: error pops up that Cannot find the function getNamedExpressionValue.

Error log: 
Cannot find function getNamedExpressionValue. at line 1 of chart script:'' 
exception.javascript.error ( 1 time(s) )
